title: The Art of Boundaries
subtitle: Protect your energy without building walls
description: Learn to set, communicate, and maintain healthy boundaries in all your relationships. This course teaches you to say no without guilt, ask for what you need, and protect your energy while staying connected.

modules.title: Understanding Boundaries
modules.description: What they are, why they matter, and where yours are

modules.title: Why Boundaries Are Hard
modules.description: The internal and external obstacles to healthy limits

modules.title: Setting Boundaries
modules.description: How to identify and communicate your limits

modules.title: Maintaining Boundaries
modules.description: Holding your limits when others push back

whatYouLearn: Identify where your boundaries are weak, rigid, or healthy
Understand why setting boundaries feels difficult
Language and scripts for communicating boundaries clearly
How to handle pushback without backing down
Navigate boundaries in family, work, and intimate relationships
requirements: Willingness to examine your relationship patterns
Openness to discomfort that comes with change
